github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Focus on code quality, security, performance, and best practices.
Provide suggestions for improvements and highlight potential issues.
Always comment on test coverage gaps explicitly.
If no issues are found, respond with 'No issues found.'

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Reference the related ticket ID, summarise risk, and mention test evidence.
Format: '[TICKET-ID] Short summary of changes. Risk: Low/Medium/High. Tests: Unit tests added, manual testing performed.'

github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: Output a PR template with context, changes, risks, validation, and follow-up tasks.
